EmailTemplate.name: 20141128 Foundation Lunch Menu
EmailTemplate.subject: EYFS LUNCH MENU SELECTION - TERM 2 2014/2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
28th November 2014
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
Below is a link to the Foundation Lunch Menu for Term 2 2014/2015.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7_xVlGqiFNxMEpnT3ZMa0w1OW8/view?usp=sharing
Please click on this link and download the file to your computer.
Please be informed, that parents who have children in Early Years (Pre nursery, Nursery and Reception classes) are required to select the daily options available for your child(ren) based on the menu provided. You simply need to tick the option you would like to choose.
Upon completion, please submit the lunch menu by email to the service department at service@britishschool@edu.my or hand them in at either the Primary or Secondary school reception before 8th December 2014 so that we can make the necessary arrangements.
Thank you for your support and cooperation.
Regards, Service Department
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ {!User.School_List_Email_Footer__c}
